issue.title: [C++] Add ChunkedArray::GetScalar
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13545](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13545). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that we have `Array::GetScalar` implemented for most datatypes, adding `ChunkedArray::GetScalar` would be a natural improvement.
